channel.title: How do i make it so that my people using my client can only log on to my server
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: How do i make it so that my client can only log on to my server :confused: :confused: what i tried already is the following i took what is the first code to what is the second code
[code] aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;[/code]
[code] aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + bassscape.servegame.com + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;[/code]
i couldn't compile that so...i guess it wouldnt' work. PLZ HELP!!!!

item.title: How do i make it so that my people using my client can only log on to my server
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

k - now go to ur desktop

go to programs

then accesories

then command promt

when ur in command promt type

ipconfig

then tell me what is after

Ip Adress:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2008, 09:38:10 PM[/size][hr]w8 dude man - umm patrick - what’s server slot?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so that my people using my client can only log on to my server
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Wow, talk about a bunch of retards who know nothing about clients. LOL. All you do is take out the server IP, and add your server IP to the server slot next to “43594”. That’s it. It won’t work perfect, but its what you want. If I explain more, obviously, you’d just say “wut? i dun git it”

Read full topic
